A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In many ways while I was watching the Last Jedi but the after taste is seriously bad. Its like this movie was done by people who don't know the Star wars universe and couldn't care less about the world and the characters from the old movies. They also don't seem to know how to write believable characters so it feels like the franchise is now officially dead. It's a beauty to watch but painful to digest.
